reviews.review: Portal 2 is a great adventure in which your charachter, Chell, is put through a series of tests after killing the evil GLaDOS in the events of the original Portal. It is a very good game for those people that like a mixture of story, some humor, and puzzles, lots and lots of puzzles.

If you never played Portal 1, I suggest you do. However, this game stands on its own as one of the greatest of all time. Physics games have nothing on the deep story and humor imbedded in Portal 2. Check it out.

Expanding on the story of the first game, we find out the history behind Aprature Science and GlaDos. The voice acting is top notch, which definitly adds to the comedy of the game. The puzzles in singleplayer arent as mind boggling as they could be, I rarely stared in awe of my own stupidity during it. The community maps do put up a challange however. There are some real gems hidden within the workshop.

PUZZLES, HUMOR, STORY, ANNOYING USER MADE LEVELS.
COUNT ME IN!

How can i recommend a game like this?
Almost everyone knows it!
Almost everyone played it!
Almost everyone like it!

I cant even say which story is better. Singleplayer or Multiplayer, they are both great.

Since Workshop is released it's just more epic.

Maximum ---> 10/10
Vivid Environments, Stunning Storytelling and an immense immersion of humour in what is the best of valves collection to date.

A thousand times better than the original, get this goddamnit

oh and co-op

Portal 2 is a beautiful game! 2 things that makes you thrill~ first the glados and whealthy(android who control the facilities), their charactor are so beautiful, you will enjoying watching their attitude ×D...
Second, is when you complete a stage. You feel like u r clever boy~where actually not really.maybe. then you have co-op mode, this is new level style of gameplay where ur partner really impotant as you unlike some other co-op game where sometime u think u can do it alone. About the graphic,It may not  great as compare with the best graphic u ever known but its good enough make u dont care abt it. Conclusion,after u finish this game..u will feel sad,happy and curious about this game and hoping for Portal 3. 

95% spectacular!
전작에 비해 더욱 방대한 분량과 추가요소, 재미있는 스토리, 그리고 코옵(협동 플레이)과 user made levels까지.. 정말 대박. 고민을 좀 하게 만드는 퍼즐 게임임에도 불구하고 조금만 고민해보면 다 풀리는 것들이고, 레벨 디자인을 정말 잘한 듯.
Awesome!!! even better than the first:)  If you love puzzles and have a rudimentary understanding of physics then Aperture Science wants you!
The in-game level editor: Perpetual Testing Initiative is AWESOME!!!!

Awesome game, I am really glad I bought it. The storyline is really funny, and the ending cracked me up.  Love the voices, they are fantastic. 
Hope they make a third one.
Good game.
Very fun and challenging.

pretty good game to get together with your girlfriend

A gun that shoots portals, an evil AI, love, hate, betrayal, science, a dying old man with strange advice, more science, more betrayal, potatoes, birds, science and... SCIENCE! (There might or might not also be cake. Who knows.)
If you do not own this game yet, go get it. For science! You monster!

Das beste am Spiel ist aber die Story die ein richtig packt. Man fühlt sich so, als ob man das Testsubjekt ist! Unglaublich :D

I really enjoyed the first Portal game and I was really exicted about the second one coming out and I was not disapointed at all. Portal 2 is a great addon to the series. It's funny, has good puzzles to figure out. I really enjoy almost everything about that game.

This game is mind-blowing, and now that I can make my own test chambers to share with the gaming world, I believe it might be the game of the decade.

Fucking excellent game I'm just now getting around to this for a review since I just bought it on here roughly a week ago but I've beaten it on the xbox. I have to say this game is nearly perfect in everyway. Gameplay mechanics are terrific, excellent controls, fun multiplayer, all around feel- good experience. So cutting this short and simple. Get this game, download it, and enjoy.
Freakin' awesome! Everything about this game is amazing!

Que dire sur Portal 2 ? Tout a déjà été dit dessus, et en écrivant ceci, je ne ferais qu'ajouter mes louanges sur ce jeu exceptionnel. Portal 2, c'est Portal puissance 10 en jouabilité, mécanismes, scénario, graphismes, etc. J'ai également eu la chance de tester (xD) un mode co-op superbe avec ses énigmes à se tordre les méninges en les résolvant à deux. Portal 2, un jeu légendaire pour une licence légendaire.

What can I say about Portal 2? Everything has been said about this game, and when I write this, I will only add my praisings on this exceptional game. Portal 2, it's Portal at power 10 in gameplay, mechanisms, story, graphisms, etc. I had also the chance to test (xD) a wonderful co-op mode with its puzzles which will torture you and your partner, with mutual satisfaction when finished. Portal 2, a legendary game for a legendary licence.
very fun puzzle game sequel to top selling game portal

I Recommend this game to every one, has a lot of eater eggs, and 1 of the best hidden storys of all time, if you have not played Portal 1 and/or Portal 2, they are a most buy, trust me its money will spent!

Portal 2 is one of the best games ever created. From start to finish everything from the voice acting to the suspenseful soundtrack to the detailed environmental design immerses you in the world of Aperture Laboratories.

The puzzles are challenging without being frustrating. The testing environments introduce new mechanics at an interval regular enough to keep the gameplay fresh without becoming overwhelming. The campaign is a perfect length to play through and feel like you've been on a long, satisfying journey.

Playing its predecessor isn't a requirement, but it does add context to the story.

Portal 2 is a game where you go in one side and come out the other changed- and wanting everyone you know to play so they can enjoy it as much as you did.

Jeu PAR-FAIT, suite logique du 1, l'histoire tien debout (malgré quelques points un peu flous), graphismes magnifiques, animations superbes, musiques enivrentes, GLaDOS toujours aussi charmente, co-op très drôle. Bref, un exellent jeu, a avoir.
The only game series to make me say to myself "This is impossible" "I'm a Genius" "I'm an Idiot" all within five minutes, and on one level.

It improves on the original by going bananas with everything. Features crazy new elements, different settings and even more insane and awesome characters. And also multiplayer. And also a map editor. And bouncy gel. And Cave Johnson. And more Half Life easter eggs. And potatos.
The Steam Workshop is a blast, a great addition to this great game.  No more fumbling around maps and asking "did I put the file in the right path ?" to exhaustion.

One of my favorite games of all time! The single player is a blast with great level design and witty humor. coop is great with a random and even better with a friend. Now with workshop support the chambers never end for both singleplayer and coop! 

This game is worth 10 bucks easy but can be gotten on sale for a buck!
pretty good
Impresionante. Si el primero era sublime, este es perfecto.
Love it.
SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
You must play this game, simply the best game of last year. And also for Science... you Monster...
PORTAL!!!!! Need I say more?

One of my favorite games of all time. The puzzles are fun, the dialogue is clever and always provides a laugh, and the story is entertaining to the end. Co-op is also a very good time. Pair all that with free co-op DLC and the new level creator, and there's absolutely nothing not to love about this game. Buy it. Buy it now.

I'm late to the party so no cake for me, I've yet to play the co-op, though I bought this game for the Single Player enrichment. 

I'm happy to say Valve deliver everytime!

Slaughtering your friend and saying that it was an accident never gets old. Though I am a bit disturbed with the noticable lack of incinerators. Also a couple more buddies to hug would be nice, but you can't wish for everything.
Just get this game. Otherwise, you have not lived.
Best sequel to a cake baking sim ever.
Was fun. :)
If you don't play this game I will burn your house down with combustible lemons.

One of the top games Valve has ever made. Considering pretty much everything Vavle makes is considered 'top notch' in the industry, being top-of-the-top is a huge responsibility- but Portal 2 carries it well! A good long game with a well thought out and engaging storyline, fleshed-out witty characters, and loads of replay value especially with the new Perpetual Testing Initiative out and about. Also add the fact that this is two games for the price of one- the multiplayer and single-player have seperate story lines of the same generous length. One of the best strategy games I've ever played, with a touch of adventure in all the right places.

I think it's even better than Portal (1) due to the new additional gameplay elements, the longer and funnier single player campaign, the challenging coop-mode and the new released puzzle maker, where you can easily build your own test chambers and upload them for the whole community.
Barato. vale a pena comprar ! ! ! !
Non ricordo esattamente perché lo consiglio solo adesso. Giocateci e basta, è IL gioco. Co-op fantastica. Finitevi anche il primo però, questo è un diretto seguito.
It's just great.

Einfach ein tolles Spiel!
Der Einzelspieler ist nie langweilig und nur mit klarem denken kommt man vorran!
Der Co-op ist fast noch besser! 
Einfach nur FUN bei zocken!
:)

I strongly recommend playing Portal 1 first, and only playing this if you liked the puzzles, are interested in the story behind GLaDOS, or want to make your own Test Chambers using the built-in editor.  

Other than that, loved the game.  One of the few that I went back and played through a second time.  And the Co-op campaign is a lot of fun, especially if neither you nor your partner have played through it before.

I have to say, very nice sequel as far as sequels go. I felt like the integrity of Portal was kept, but heightened by the new puzzle pieces like Jump Goo and Run Goo. Although at the same time that ultimately made the Puzzles easier. So my rating for Portal 2 is a 9/10 for following up and answering questions with a Story that I've always pondered and also for making another innovative game. From this point I just hope they are giving Half-Life 3 some needed "Portal" attention. Mhhhmmm Borealis!! Oh and also awesome characters as well as Graphics. Ran the game on Ultimate- Beautiful!
Infinite Game. Workshop, Level Editor, hilarious campaign and fun and clever coop. I also need people to play this with so yea. Get it.
Valve took everything I loved about the first game and squared it. This is how a sequel is done, folks.
Чудесная игра, купить всем, кто не купил. Проходить обязательно. А если есть чудесный друг проходить и с ним!

10/10.
Awesome story with awesome gameplay!

Once you are awakened in the aperture science laboratories after hundreds of years of sleep, everything has changed, the complex is collapsing, the emergency evacuation is in progress. But by accident you reactivate the complex, and you get stuck being tested again! 

+ Awesome gameplay, awesome story, new gameplay techniques, Co-op, Puzzlemaker, Audio is very good.
- Well haven't found any, maybe that the coop isn't that story based (I love good stories)

The new Perpetual Testing Initiative makes this game playable for hours and hours due thousands community maps in the workshop.

This game deserves to be in everyone's gamelist!
A MUST HAVE!

You've done it again, Gaben! Not just a fun single-player with memorable quotes, not just an awesome co-op you can play with your buds and laugh with them to your failures. Now, with PeTI, we can easily make, browse, download and share our puzzles to infinity... and beyond! If I wasn't the man I was, I'd kiss ya.

If you like Portal 1, you'll love Portal 2. Trust me. 

Coop is also a great addition.
Very fun game to play! It's probably the seccond best game I have. Now you could even build your own maps and things. The 20$ is really worth it!
No comment.

Exelente jogo.
Agora com os mapas criados pelos usuários é diversão eterna.

Well, another Portal release come and gone.  I finally beat this game, too, so now I feel obligated to make a recommend this game as well.
Portal 2 picks up about 2 years(?) after Portal 1 left off after Chell was (ANTI-SPOILER CENSOR).  You get the portal gun back, and you actually pair up with GlaDos.  If only Wheatly didn't reasemble her!
Anyway, the ending was pretty dramatic, funny, and pretty epic if you ask me (you see Chell's arms!).  I have tried a bit of the co-op, which requires some communication with your partner, but word to the wise:  there's a story that picks up where the single-player ends, so beat the SP first.  They just added a level editor, which is pretty user friendly (note:  the emancipation grids are called "Fizzlers), and you get to upload them and stuff.
All in all, Portal 2 is a good game to play, and it has some goodies to keep me sucked in for a while.
